mapper.select: SELECT MAX(id) AS MAX_ID FROM xxl_job_info

SELECT t.id , t.job_group , t.job_desc , t.add_time , t.update_time , t.author , t.alarm_email , t.schedule_type , t.schedule_conf , t.misfire_strategy , t.executor_route_strategy , t.executor_handler , t.executor_param , t.executor_block_strategy , t.executor_timeout , t.executor_fail_retry_count , t.glue_type , t.glue_source , t.glue_remark , t.glue_updatetime , t.child_jobid , t.trigger_status , t.trigger_last_time , t.trigger_next_time , JSON_VALUE(executor_param, '$.planKey') as 'plan_key' , a.id as notification_id , xxl_job_id , product_line , remark , online_time , responsible_person , responsible_person_name , it_person , job_status , subscription_enabled , execute_time , job_environment , notification_no , push_type , field_name , isnull((select approve_status from notification_job_subscription where notification_job_id = a.id and subscription_person = #{username}), 0) as subscription_status from (SELECT id , job_group , job_desc , add_time , update_time , author , alarm_email , schedule_type , schedule_conf , misfire_strategy , executor_route_strategy , executor_handler , executor_param , executor_block_strategy , executor_timeout , executor_fail_retry_count , glue_type , glue_source , glue_remark , glue_updatetime , child_jobid , trigger_status , trigger_last_time , trigger_next_time FROM xxl_job_info where executor_handler = 'RobotHandle') t join notification_job_info a on t.id = a.xxl_job_id where (#{planKey} is null or #{planKey} = '' or JSON_VALUE(executor_param, '$.planKey') = #{planKey}) and (#{productLine} is null or #{productLine} = '' or product_line = #{productLine}) and (#{fieldName} is null or #{fieldName} = '' or field_name = #{fieldName}) and job_environment = #{jobEnvironment}
